articles.author: Emily Goodin
articles.title: Harry and Meghan asked to use Air Force One and were turned down - Daily Mail
articles.description: Harry and Meghan have tried a variety of methods to gain access to political figures, including sending gifts and inviting Jill Biden to the Invictus Games.
articles.content: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle wanted to ride back to the United States on Air Force One after the Queen's funeral but the request was denied by the White House in case it caused a 'commotion,' sourc… [+10891 chars]
